title: FT_TN16 Function Block
description: The FT_TN16 Function Block receives a real input value and a time duration, processing these to maintain a circular array of input values and produce an output value. The block triggers an output signal when the conditions are met based on the time elapsed.
name: FT_TN16

input.name: in
input.description: The real input value to be processed.

input.name: T
input.description: The time duration that influences the input processing frequency.

output.name: out
output.description: The output value from the circular array of input values.

output.name: trig
output.description: A boolean flag that indicates whether a new value has been output.
